data.name: Lilly Looking Through Demo
data.detailed_description:
What Lilly sees is about to change her life forever....
Help our heroine through a variety of enchanting environments brimming with magic and wonder, as she seeks to rewrite the past, change the present, and unlock the ultimate mystery. Geeta Games presents an animated point-and-click adventure for all ages:
Lilly Looking Through.
data.about_the_game:
What Lilly sees is about to change her life forever....
Help our heroine through a variety of enchanting environments brimming with magic and wonder, as she seeks to rewrite the past, change the present, and unlock the ultimate mystery. Geeta Games presents an animated point-and-click adventure for all ages:
Lilly Looking Through.
data.short_description: What Lilly sees is about to change her life forever.... Help our heroine through a variety of enchanting environments brimming with magic and wonder, as she seeks to rewrite the past, change the present, and unlock the ultimate mystery. Geeta Games presents an animated point-and-click adventure for all ages: Lilly Looking Through.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Japanese, Norwegian, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“"The visuals are immediately arresting – the scenes, as we might expect from our indie adventures these days, are beautifully drawn and painted."”
Indie Game Magazine

“"I sit here barefooted, the socks charmed off me by the demo version of Lilly Looking Through which is one of the most beautiful things I've ever pointed at and clicked on."”
Rock, Paper, Shotgun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window XP and later
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5.8 Leopard, or later
  • Processor: Intel Mac 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 155 MB available space
